General.Name: Horizon Securities Co Ltd
General.Description: Horizon Securities Co., Ltd. provides securities brokerage services in Taiwan. It offers securities overseas trading, underwriting, registrar agency, and margin purchase and short sale services, as well as engages in futures brokerage, proprietary trading, and consulting businesses. The company was incorporated in 1961 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
